Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Abstractions.AbstractMapItem
      • Models.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Player
extends AbstractMapItem
    Player represents player data and the player on the map
    See Also:
